alert.note: Alert for Coweta (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:40PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carroll, southwestern Douglas and northwestern Coweta Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 739 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Seaton Lake, or 8 miles southeast of Carrollton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Whitesburg, Clem, Plant Yates, Byers Crossroads, Abilene, Treasure Lake, Hannah, Arnco-Sargent, Seaton Lake, and Fairplay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
